titleStmt.title: Glossographia, or, A dictionary interpreting all such hard words of whatsoever language now used in our refined English tongue with etymologies, definitions and historical observations on the same : also the terms of divinity, law, physick, mathematicks and other arts and sciences explicated / by T.B.
titleStmt.author: Blount, Thomas, 1618-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcombe for George Sawbridge,

notesStmt.note: "Very useful for all such as desire to understand what they read."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
